alert.note: Alert for Clay (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:17AM CST until February 27 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land and agriculture land near the creek is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.2 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Tibbee Creek Tibbee 23.0 24.9 Thu 9 am CST 24.7 23.2 19.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7PM CST.
